name: shacl-guru
description: A VS Code chat assistant for SHACL (Shapes Constraint Language). Generate, explain, and modify SHACL shapes in natural language.

chatParticipants.name: shacl
chatParticipants.description: What SHACL Shape do you want to create?

commands.name: explain
commands.description: Explain the selected SHACL shape or concept.

commands.name: best-practices
commands.description: List best practices for writing SHACL shapes.

commands.name: generate-conforming
commands.description: Generate RDF that conforms to the selected shape.

commands.name: generate-violating
commands.description: Generate RDF that violates the selected shape and explain why.

commands.name: add-constraint
commands.description: Add a property or constraint to the selected shape.

commands.name: infer-shape
commands.description: Infer a SHACL shape from selected RDF data.

commands.name: help
commands.description: Show help for all commands and features.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
